verses.verse: Open <WH6605> thy doors, <WH1817> O Lebanon, <WH3844> that the fire <WH784> may devour <WH398> thy cedars. <WH730>

Howl, <WH3213> fir tree; <WH1265> for <WH3588> the cedar <WH730> is fallen; <WH5307> because <WH834> the mighty <WH117> are spoiled: <WH7703> howl, <WH3213> O ye oaks <WH437> of Bashan; <WH1316> for <WH3588> the forest <WH3293> of the vintage <WH1208> is come down. <WH3381>

There is a voice <WH6963> of the howling <WH3215> of the shepherds; <WH7462> for <WH3588> their glory <WH155> is spoiled: <WH7703> a voice <WH6963> of the roaring <WH7581> of young lions; <WH3715> for <WH3588> the pride <WH1347> of Jordan <WH3383> is spoiled. <WH7703>
Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> my God; <WH430> Feed <WH7462> <WH853> the flock <WH6629> of the slaughter; <WH2028>

Whose <WH834> possessors <WH7069> slay <WH2026> them, and hold themselves not guilty: <WH816> <WH3808> and they that sell <WH4376> them say, <WH559> Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD; <WH3068> for I am rich: <WH6238> and their own shepherds <WH7462> pity <WH2550> <WH5921> them not. <WH3808>

For <WH3588> I will no <WH3808> more <WH5750> pity <WH2550> <WH5921> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land, <WH776> saith <WH5002> the LORD: <WH3068> but, lo, <WH2009> I <WH595> will deliver <WH4672> <WH853> the men <WH120> every one <WH376> into his neighbor's <WH7453> hand, <WH3027> and into the hand <WH3027> of his king: <WH4428> and they shall smite <WH3807> <WH853> the land, <WH776> and out of their hand <WH4480> <WH3027> I will not <WH3808> deliver <WH5337> them.

And I will feed <WH7462> <WH853> the flock <WH6629> of slaughter, <WH2028> even you, O poor <WH6041> of the flock. <WH6629> And I took <WH3947> unto me two <WH8147> staves; <WH4731> the one <WH259> I called <WH7121> Beauty, <WH5278> and the other <WH259> I called <WH7121> Bands; <WH2256> and I fed <WH7462> <WH853> the flock. <WH6629>
<WH853> Three <WH7969> shepherds <WH7462> also I cut off <WH3582> in one <WH259> month; <WH3391> and my soul <WH5315> loathed <WH7114> them, and their soul <WH5315> also <WH1571> abhorred <WH973> me.

Then said <WH559> I, I will not <WH3808> feed <WH7462> you: that that dieth, <WH4191> let it die; <WH4191> and that that is to be cut off, <WH3582> let it be cut off; <WH3582> and let the rest <WH7604> eat <WH398> every one <WH802> <WH853> the flesh <WH1320> of another. <WH7468>

And I took <WH3947> <WH853> my staff, <WH4731> even <WH853> Beauty, <WH5278> and cut it asunder, <WH1438> <WH853> that I might break <WH6565> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> I had made <WH3772> with <WH854> all <WH3605> the people. <WH5971>

And it was broken <WH6565> in that <WH1931> day: <WH3117> and so <WH3651> the poor <WH6041> of the flock <WH6629> that waited upon <WH8104> me knew <WH3045> that <WH3588> it <WH1931> was the word <WH1697> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And I said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, If <WH518> ye think good, <WH2895> <WH5869> give <WH3051> me my price; <WH7939> and if <WH518> not, <WH3808> forbear. <WH2308> So they weighed for <WH8254> <WH853> my price <WH7939> thirty <WH7970> pieces of silver. <WH3701>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Cast <WH7993> it unto <WH413> the potter: <WH3335> a goodly <WH145> price <WH3366> that <WH834> I was prised at <WH3365> of <WH4480> <WH5921> them. And I took <WH3947> the thirty <WH7970> pieces of silver, <WH3701> and cast <WH7993> them to <WH413> the potter <WH3335> in the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>

Then I cut asunder <WH1438> <WH853> mine other <WH8145> staff, <WH4731> <WH853> even Bands, <WH2256> that I might break <WH6565> <WH853> the brotherhood <WH264> between <WH996> Judah <WH3063> and Israel. <WH3478>
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Take <WH3947> unto thee yet <WH5750> the instruments <WH3627> of a foolish <WH196> shepherd. <WH7462>

For, <WH3588> lo, <WH2009> I <WH595> will raise <WH6965> up a shepherd <WH7462> in the land, <WH776> which shall not <WH3808> visit <WH6485> those that be cut off, <WH3582> neither <WH3808> shall seek <WH1245> the young one, <WH5289> nor <WH3808> heal <WH7495> that that is broken, <WH7665> nor <WH3808> feed <WH3557> that that standeth still: <WH5324> but he shall eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> of the fat, <WH1277> and tear their claws in pieces. <WH6561> <WH6541>

Woe <WH1945> to the idol <WH457> shepherd <WH7473> that leaveth <WH5800> the flock! <WH6629> the sword <WH2719> shall be upon <WH5921> his arm, <WH2220> and upon <WH5921> his right <WH3225> eye: <WH5869> his arm <WH2220> shall be clean dried up, <WH3001> <WH3001> and his right <WH3225> eye <WH5869> shall be utterly darkened. <WH3543> <WH3543>
